title: Repairing SSDs?
message: Does anyone have a clue about fixing liquid-damaged, non-mounting SSDs? People are buying them up pretty quickly from me so someone has a clear path to fixing them. Not sure what it is though.

title: Repairing SSDs?
message: No idea how. Ebay is full of idiots that buy useless crap, it is THE place to sell your unrepairable junk. Getting $350 for a complete pile of shit Retina is no problem. So I bet there are enough idiots that will pay $50 for a dead 256GB SSD.

title: Repairing SSDs?
message: Okay, yeah, I've compared resistor and capacitor values to functional ones and didn't see anything off so I'm assuming these issues are with one of the bigger chips. Not my battle to fight. I'll keep selling them.
